content.rendered:
Directed by S.S. Rajamouli.

Written by S.S. Rajamouli. C.H. Vijay Kumar. Ajay Kumar. Madhan Karky. Manoj Muntashir.

Cast Prabhas(Shivudu / Baahubali). Rana Daggubati(Bhallaladeva). Anushka Shetty(Devasena). Tamannaah Bhatia(Avanthika). Sathyaraj(Kattappa). Ramya Krishnan(Shivagami). Nassar(Bijjaladeva). Rohini(Sanga). Meka Rama Krishna(Jaya Varma). Adivi Sesh(Bhadra). Prabhakar(Kalakeya War Lord Inkoshi). Tanikella Bharani(Swamiji). Sudeep(Aslam Khan). Charandeep Surneni(Inkoshi’s Brother). Teja Kakumanu(Saketudu). Rakesh Varre(Sethupathi). Nora Fatehi(Dancer in Green Blouse). Madhussneha Upadhyay(Dancer in Blue Blouse). Scarlett Mellish Wilson(Dancer in Orange Blouse). Rajsekhar Aningi(Bhalladeva Samantha Raju). S.S. Rajamouli(Alcohol Seller (uncredited)) .Gabriela Bertante.Bhanu Sri. Ragini Dev(Iravati). Ganessh Divekar(Aslam Khan (voice)).Sri Simha Koduri. John Kokken(Kalki Brothers).Chandramogli Madem. Imran Manzoor(Imran Manzoor).Venkat Prasad.Subbaraya Sarma. Deependra Singh(Deependra Singh).Pingpong Surya. Venkat Vadisetti(Hero Friend). Preity Ãœpala(Tapsi Awhan)

Languages Telugu. Tamil.

Producers Prasad Devineni. Luanne Markey. Deepak Prajapat. K. Raghavendra Rao. Natarajan Ramji. Iliya Sotirov. M.M. Srivalli. Shobu Yarlagadda.

Production Arka Mediaworks.
